import { Box, Stack } from '@mui/material' import React from 'react' import { useRoomContext } from '../context/RoomProvider' import AspectRatio from "@mui/joy/AspectRatio"; import { } from "@mui/material"; export const RoomDetails = () => { const { rooms } = useRoomContext() const title = rooms.title const capacity = rooms.capacity const amenities = rooms.amenities const allows = rooms.allows const donts = rooms.donts const description = rooms.description const price = rooms.price const imgUrl = rooms.imgUrl return (
Overview
) }
